duties_responsibilities.duty: Provides specific patient care duties and performs unit support activities in the operating room suite.
Updates surgeon preference card per entity specific processes and adheres to count policies and procedures.
Accountable for instrument trays and ensures appropriate care and handling of surgical instruments and equipment.
Adheres to National Patient Safety Goals, including surgical time-out, medication/fluid labeling, hand hygiene, and use of personal protective equipment.
Assist in achieving department expense per unit of service and identifies opportunities for cost containment in patient care.
Assists with new employee orientation and training of students.
Utilizes down time effectively, including assisting other staff, restocking rooms, and instrument processing.

education_certification.credential: Approved program for Operating Room Technicians or demonstrated technical skills through on the job training.
